original_text: When they arrived, they sent a message to the group of believers in Antioch. When all the believers had come together, Paul and Barnabas told them about their journey. They told the believers about everything that God had helped them to do. They said, ‘God has made it possible now for Gentiles to believe in Jesus.’
korean_text: 그들이 이르러 교회를 모아 하나님이 함께 행하신 모든 일과 이방인들에게 믿음의 문을 여신 것을 보고하고

sentences.original_text: they sent a message to the group of believers in Antioch.
When all the believers had come together,
Paul and Barnabas told them about their journey.
sentences.korean_translation: 바울과 바나바는 자신들의 여정에 대해 그들에게 말했습니다.

sentences.original_text: They told the believers about everything
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 모든 것에 대해 신자들에게 말했습니다

sentences.original_text: that God had helped them to do.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님이 그들이 하도록 도우신 모든 것에 대해.

sentences.original_text: for Gentiles to believe in Jesus.'
